name: freshmart-grocery-app
description: A modern online grocery store with React frontend and Python Flask backend

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && python3 app.py" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: cd backend && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python3 app.py" "cd frontend && npm run dev"

author: FreshMart Team
